newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures sharply higher in late trading.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures sharply higher in late trading.

text.p: June 12 - U.S. debt futures were up sharply late and volume picked up from midday levels. One trading floor desk manager said traders optimistic about May producer price data Friday after bond friendly data Thursday. Sept T-bonds breaches 111-16/32 resistance to reach 111-17/32, then backs off.
